content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany. He was a potential landlord showing me an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment. It was an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed price was 700 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 10.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [700] No, there was no instance of discrimination or offense in the conversation.
name: Max Müller
